```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(robotstxt)
library(rvest)
library(knitr)
library(pdftools)
library(janitor)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Data wrangling on Nuclear

```{r}
nuclear<- read.csv("Nuclear.csv")

nuclear_adjusted<-nuclear[-c(1:4,6:8,12:19,20:21,23:28,31:34)]
```


# Data wrangling on Wind

